name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.concurrency-level
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt on a MapReduce task. The configuration option 'mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.concurrency-level' is related to MapReduce tasks and could be the root cause if it is not properly configured.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.max-retries
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt on a MapReduce task. The configuration option 'yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.max-retries' is related to the number of retries for MapReduce tasks and could be the root cause if it is not properly configured.

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt on a MapReduce task. The configuration option 'dfs.client.socket-timeout' is related to the timeout value for all sockets and could be the root cause if it is not properly configured.
